resources.string: Nothing added yetâ€¦ How about you add something?
Check out jToDo, a cool app i found on Play Store!

jToDo is a simple to-do list application written for Android using Java. It\'s completely free and open source. You can download the source code at https://github.com/ayy-em/jToDo and contribute to the project by adding new features or reporting bugs. Contact me at mironov-hse@yandex.ru or jm-ams.nl for whatever it is you want to contact me.
